Address.value: 1202 PUERTA DEL SOL,UNIT B, SAN CLEMENTE, California, 92673, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Marygold Companies, Inc. is a global holding company. The Company's segments include U.S.A. investment fund management, U.S.A. beauty products, New Zealand food industry, Canada security alarm systems and U.K.: Financial services. It operates through its subsidiaries, which include USCF Investments, Inc. (USCF Investments), Tiger Financial & Asset Management Limited, Gourmet Foods, Ltd, Printstock Products Limited, Brigadier Security Systems (2000) Ltd (Brigadier) and Kahnalytics, Inc. doing business as Original Sprout. Brigadier provides security solutions including access control, camera systems, fire alarm monitoring panels, and intrusion alarms to home and business owners as well as government offices, schools, and public buildings. Gourmet Foods, Ltd. is a provider of baked goods and pies. Its brands are Pats Pantry, which offers baked goods, and Ponsonby Pies, which offers pies. Original Sprout is engaged in the wholesale distribution of hair and skin care products.
